Verify the 'Submit Order' button displays text 'Submit Order', has background color rgb(40,167,69), text color #ffffff, padding 10px 20px, font weight 600, is enabled, and triggers a 300ms 'pulse' animation on click
Verify the 'Confirm Deletion' modal dialog becomes visible when triggered, having width 400px, height 250px, and is centered at x 50%, y 50% of the viewport
Verify its background opacity is 0.9
Verify its heading displays the text 'Delete Item?'
Verify the footer's copyright text reads '© 2023 Example Company' in font size 12px, color #6c757d, and is text aligned center
Verify the 'Privacy Policy' link's text is 'Privacy Policy', and its source is 'https://www.example.com/privacy'
Verify the video player's 'Play' button is visible
Verify the video element itself is initially muted
Upon playing, verify the video goes fullscreen and occupies width 100vw, height 100vh
Verify the video controls have opacity 1 when active
Inspect the image gallery displaying 5 thumbnail images, each with width 100px, height 75px, and loaded within 300ms
Verify the gallery supports horizontal scroll, exposing all images when scrolled to the right
Verify the 'Language' dropdown menu contains a count of 3 items
Verify the 'English' option is selected, has font size 15px, and text color #0056b3
Verify the other options have text color #333333

Verify the error message 'Invalid credentials.' is visible, has text color #dc3545, font weight 700, background color #f8d7da, border radius 5px, and remains visible for exactly 3000ms before fading out
Verify the file upload progress bar starts with value 0%, has width 300px
Verify its filled portion has background color #28a745
Verify a smooth 500ms transition occurs as its value updates to 75%
Hover over the help icon
Verify a tooltip appears, displaying text 'Enter your full name.', positioned at x 10px, y -30px relative to the icon, has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, and padding 8px
Verify the search results list displays a count of 10 items
Verify each search result item has width 100%, height 80px, and bottom margin of 15px
Verify the search results are aligned in a single column layout
Inspect the 'Remember Me' checkbox's associated label text 'Remember Me'
Verify the 'Remember Me' checkbox is initially unchecked (not selected) and enabled
Verify its aria-label is set to 'Keep me logged in on this device'

Verify the pagination button for page '3' displays text '3', is currently active (selected), has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, border radius 50%, and both its width and height are 32px
Verify the 'Product Name' column header in the data table has text 'Product Name', font weight 600, background color #f8f9fa, text color #212529, padding 12px, width 200px, and text alignment left

Verify the user profile avatar image has source 'user_avatar.jpg', rendered dimensions 60x60px, a 2px solid border in color #007bff, border radius of 50% for a circular shape, alt text 'User Profile Picture', and is loaded
Verify the 'Welcome!' notification banner is visible with background color #e9f7ef, text color #28a745, and height 50px
Verify it automatically becomes hidden after 5000ms with a 400ms opacity transition
Verify the embedded map widget is positioned at x 0px, y 0px, with width 100%, height 300px
Verify it displays a 'Mapbox' watermark at its bottom-right corner
Verify the map tiles are loaded within 2000ms
Verify the sidebar menu is initially collapsed with width 60px and background color #f8f9fa
When expanded, verify its width becomes 250px with a 300ms transition, and it remains visible with a left position of 0px
